resources.string: BumpBid is a overbooking management system under the TravelFlex scheme. As a TravelFlex passenger, you are given the opportunity to exchange your seat for compensation (cash or seat upgrade) on a first come first serve basis. Click next to find out the current offer and options available.
Option 1: Receive compensation as a cash voucher
Option 2: Receive compensation as a upgrade to Business Class for the rescheduled flight
This flight is travel flex ready. Click to find out more.
Thank you for choosing to participate in the TravelFlex scheme. The BumpBid process has started for the flight
Bumpbid is a system under the Travel Flex scheme. Travel Flex passengers , like yourself, are given the option to give up their seats in the event of overbooking in exchange for rewards

1. View the current offer and accept if offer id desired.

2. BumpBid offer might be closed when cap number of passengers has accepted. Click fast!

3. Results will be released 40 min before the flight. When overbooking occurs, travel flex passengers are selected on a first-come, first-serve basis. Accept offer early to avoid disappointment!\n
4.All passengers who accepted the cash offer wil be given meal vouchers to thank you for enrolling in this program.

5. Once you click accept, you are unable change your option from the app. Please contact our service staff for more information.
